title: Extra blank page
content: Firefox makes an extra blank page when I click on any link the first time after opening the browser. It does not make an extra page with subsequent clicks on links. What is the fix for this?
creator: wendybolt

title: Hulu buffers constantly with firefox
content: I use many of ythe streaming services with Firefox but Hulu does not run well with Firefox. I cleared data to see if that would fix it. I even switched to data saver and still had issues. I loaded it on Chrome and have no issues now. Thought I would give some feedback. What can we do to fix the slowness to Hulu?
creator: todd.copen

title: very slow performance
content:
Hi

got very slow performance. Please see attached screenshots. One is htop and other is ff process manager. Latter shows cpu usage at 220% for data decoder? How do i go about shutting down resources unimportant for system? What do i do to reduce such high resource usage?

thankyou for any help mirza.
creator: ab2qik

title: This page has no back choice.  It also won't mimize so I can't copy my question which lead me to this page in the first place, which is irratating.
content: Add a "Don't show me this again" button to the popup "This page is slowing down Firefox. Etc." This message is unnecessary. A web site that I visit a lot has a lot of traffic and I will never stop Firefox when I'm there. Patience is the way to deal with slowness.
creator: victorhart

title: Pop-ups
content: I keep getting unwanted pop-ups from travel reveal.com......how do I make them stop?
creator: dildayfarms
